import React,{useState}from'react';import{updateBusinessTrip}from'../services/api';import TextInput from'./TextInput';import SelectInput from'./SelectInput';// Komponente zum Bearbeiten von Gesch채ftsreisen
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditBusinessTrip=_ref=>{let{trip,setEditingTrip}=_ref;const[destination,setDestination]=useState(trip.destination);const[name,setName]=useState(trip.name);const[email,setEmail]=useState(trip.email);const[date,setDate]=useState(trip.date);const[error,setError]=useState('');const destinations=["New York","San Francisco","Chicago","Los Angeles","Miami"];const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!destination||!name||!email||!date){setError('Bitte alle Felder ausf체llen');return;}const updatedTrip={...trip,destination,name,email,date};updateBusinessTrip(updatedTrip).then(()=>{setEditingTrip(null);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SelectInput,{value:destination,onChange:e=>setDestination(e.target.value),options:destinations,placeholder:"Select Destination"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),placeholder:"Date"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update Trip"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>setEditingTrip(null),children:"Cancel"})]});};export default EditBusinessTrip;
